solution_line_template: The total number of messages sent last week on Monday and Tuesday is {monday_messages}+{tuesday_messages} = <<{monday_messages}+{tuesday_messages}={mon_tue_total}>>{mon_tue_total} messages.

On Wednesday, the number of messages was {wednesday_more_than_prev} more than the previous day, a total of {wednesday_more_than_prev}+{tuesday_messages} = <<{wednesday_more_than_prev}+{tuesday_messages}={wednesday_messages}>>{wednesday_messages} messages.
In total, in the three days, the number of messages sent is {mon_tue_total}+{wednesday_messages} = <<{mon_tue_total}+{wednesday_messages}={three_day_total}>>{three_day_total} messages,

On Thursday, the number of messages sent was two times the number sent on Wednesday, totaling {thursday_multiplier}*{wednesday_messages} = <<{thursday_multiplier}*{wednesday_messages}={thursday_messages}>>{thursday_messages} messages.
In the four days. the number of messages sent is {three_day_total}+{thursday_messages} = <<{three_day_total}+{thursday_messages}={four_day_total}>>{four_day_total}
